original_text: You have declared today that the Lord is your God, and that you will walk in his ways, and keep his statutes and his commandments and his rules, and will obey his voice.
korean_text: 네가 오늘 여호와를 네 하나님으로 인정하고 또 그 도를 행하고 그의 규례와 명령과 법도를 지키며 그의 소리를 들으라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord is your God
and that you will walk in his ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 그의 길을 걸어갈 것임을

sentences.original_text: and keep his statutes and his commandments and his rules
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 규례와 명령과 규칙을 지킬 것임을
